synopsis.text: Grier Orphanage's Judy Abbott, a cheerful and compassionate teenager, is granted a life-changing opportunity when an anonymous benefactor, affectionately nicknamed 'Daddy Long Legs,' sponsors her education at the esteemed Lincoln Memorial Girls' School in New Jersey. With the sole stipulation of penning monthly letters to her mysterious patron, Judy embarks on a journey of self-discovery, forging new friendships with classmates from diverse backgrounds, including the affluent Julia Pendleton and her loyal friend Sally McBride. As she navigates through her newfound experiences, Judy's heartwarming tale unfolds in this standalone TV special, unrelated to the 1990's series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
